actions.title: Establish clear ownership and process for board action closure.
actions.rationale: Define a clear process and assign specific owners for each proposed board action to ensure timely resolution and update the 'Board action closure' status. Reference: Wheel governance badge.

actions.title: Implement a 'fire sale' exit mechanism for highly decaying signals.
actions.rationale: For open positions with a signal_delta < -1.5, trigger an immediate market exit to prevent further losses from rapid signal degradation. This rule needs to be configurable and tested in paper mode first. Reference: Section 3.4a Signal trend (open positions).

actions.title: Generate the correlation cache for proper risk assessment.
